title: How do I tell that my phone is fully charged?
answer:
l   If you are charging your phone when it is powered on, press the power button to turn on the screen. If the battery icon on the status bar becomes ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141202182508598001.png), or "Charged" is displayed on the lock screen, your phone is fully charged.

l   If you are charging your phone when it is powered off, press the power button to turn on the screen. If the charging indicator becomes 100%, your phone is fully charged.
